text: John Russell Dilworth (born February 14, 1970), is an American animator, character designer, storyboard artist, actor, director, writer, and producer. He is known for being the creator of the adult animated television sitcom Mark's World (2009-present). He also worked on the original opening for Nicktoons and for shows such as Dexter's Laboratory, The Powerpuff Girls, Samurai Jack and My Life as a Teenage Robot, as well as the Kids' WB television series Johnny Test and The X-Presidents segments for NBC television series Saturday Night Live. ==References== ==Other websites== *StretchFilms.com, Homepage of Dilworth's Animation Company * *Interview with Dilworth Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American animators Category:American cartoonists Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Actors from New York City
title: John R. Dilworth
